page.title: 05The Radio Station
page.content: We went to the Radio Station. We pressed a button and then a man looked out of a window. He talked to us out of a box and then the gate opened on its own. A man took us to a maintenance room and then we went with John. He took us to the battery room. They keep lots of batteries in case anything breaks down. They have lots of different sizes. Then we went to the 300 receiving room and we heard a Frenchman on a ship and heard a teleprinter which sounded like some birds talking. We heard an Englishman talking on the phone, finding out someone's phone number in Newfoundland.
